tool_description: Optimizes visual content specifically for individual social media platforms by adjusting dimensions, file formats, compression, and metadata requirements.

content_url.description: URL or path to the content to optimize

platform.description: Target platform: facebook, instagram, twitter, linkedin, youtube, tiktok, pinterest

content_format.description: Content format: post, story, cover, profile, thumbnail, reel, video, carousel

optimize_for.description: Optimization priority: quality, speed, engagement, reach

error_messages: Content not accessible: Ensure content_url points to a valid image or video file.
Invalid platform: Use one of [facebook, instagram, twitter, linkedin, youtube, tiktok, pinterest].
Invalid content format: Use one of [post, story, cover, profile, thumbnail, reel, video, carousel].
Invalid optimization target: Use one of [quality, speed, engagement, reach].
usage: Provide content_url, specify target platform and content_format, then choose optimization priority. The tool applies platform-specific optimizations.

optimized_content_url.description: URL or path to the platform-optimized content

file_format.description: Output file format used for optimization

platform_requirements_met.description: Whether all platform requirements are satisfied
